GOP don't acknowledge change for the Billion Dollar corporations that are killing us here at home in the USA, because they are bought and paid for here's just a few PER YEAR in the USA. We have more deaths per year for smoking cigarettes then terrorism. Cigarettes and Death Cigarette smoking causes about one of every five deaths in the United States each year.1,6 Cigarette smoking is estimated to cause the following:1 More than 480,000 deaths annually (including deaths from secondhand smoke) 278,544 deaths annually among men (including deaths from secondhand smoke) 201,773 deaths annually among women (including deaths from secondhand smoke) Excessive alcohol use led to approximately 88,000 deaths and 2.5 million years of potential life lost (YPLL) each year in the United States Let's not forget FDA approved medication... There were 43,982 drug overdose deaths in the United States in 2013. Of these, 22,767 (51.8%) were related to prescription drugs of the 22,767 deaths relating to prescription drug overdose in 2013, 16,235 (71.3%) involved opioid painkillers, and 6,973 (30.6%) involved benzodiazepines. And that’s just Legal Opioids… Nobody's upset about that... Let's not forget who owns this country! Billionaires.

Anorexia isn't really about food. It's an unhealthy way to try to cope with emotional problems. When you have anorexia, you often equate thinness with self-worth. Anorexia can be very difficult to overcome. But with treatment, you can gain a better sense of who you are, return to healthier eating habits and reverse some of anorexia's serious complications.

A woman who has been diagnosed with cancer is facing the end of her life. She has a young family, she desperately wants to live. The dilemma is the world renown surgeon who can give her the best chance to survive has a horrible bedside manner. The surgeon also said some stupid stuff 11 years ago. The surgeon doesn't have the most likable personality to some. So, there is another surgeon she could consult with, but the other surgeon is corrupt as hell and will tell you anything to get your business. This other surgeon also blames her botched surgeries on Bush or the Russians. So, it comes down to a choice between the politically correct surgeon with a horrible success rate vs an experienced , competent, highly skilled , but blunt and politically incorrect surgeon. If you were facing a life or death illness , does the personality or politics of the most competent doctor or surgeon matter ? The one that gives you the best chance to survive is the only real criteria ! VOTE FOR DR. TRUMP ! This country is on life support and we need the best !!! VOTE TRUMP AND KEEP AMERICA FROM DEATH !!!
